skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who needs a cumbersome blade when the perfect weapon is literally at your fingertips?
Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: This Werekin has been touched by the gods, and the Northmen will follow him into battle with savage abandon.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Don't go anywhere near its mouth - in fact, don't even get within snapping distance if you value your limbs.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Ringing across miles, the blood curdling cry leaves knees knocking and hands shaking.

effects.description:
Enemy weapon strength: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

Enemy missile strength: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Wounds sealing up as quickly as they are open, muscles pumping with unearthly abandon.
The thirst for rended flesh further fuels the Skin Wolf's unnatural healing abilities.
For this one prays nightly with at his altar of blood.

effects.description:
Enemy melee defence: -2
	(enemy characters in region)
Enable contact effect: "Bonecrusher" that lowers melee defence and movement speed

skillTree.localised_description: A transformation so horrific, the very air grows thick with evil, protecting the advancing force of ruin.
While these slathering beasts don't exactly communicate with each other, they most certainly know how to follow the biggest and bloodiest in the pack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +2 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +2 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +4 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Skin Wolves units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Bits of gore left sloughing off and stinking terrify the enemy cavalry, encouraging the wolves to give chase.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +2% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +3% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +4% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: +6% for cavalry units
	(enemy armies in region)

Speed: +10% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The instinct to scratch their claws against passing rocks ends up grinding their claws into fearsome points.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: -2
	(enemy armies in region)
Enable contact effect: "Bleed" that cause damage over time

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The raw, corrupted hide of the Skin Wolf, scarred from its many spontaneous transmogrifications, forms a protective, armour-like layer.
Werekin flesh is scored with the symbols and marks of the Dark Gods, granting additional arcane protection to their ravaged physical forms.
The Dark Gods influence extends to the ferocity of their servants' attacks, increasing their power and reach manyfold.
Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 200

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

phases.onscreen_name: Stage One - Restore 16 Hit Points per second
Stage Two - Restore 8 Hit Points per second
Stage Three - Restore 4 Hit Points per second

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.
Such an ugly scar is always memorable.
Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.
Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.
Shares the intellect of a River Troll.
Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
I feel daemonic power within me!
Give own power to others... Not very wise.
Spawns gather around him and hear his commands.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Fimir Warrior units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Chaos Trolls are highly honoured in the eyes of the Changer of the Ways, for rarely does any creature combine mutation with such size, power, and sheer vitality.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for Norscan Trolls & Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Physically powerful, armed and armoured with both steel and sorcery, filled with evil intent. Are they even Human?

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Marauder units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Chaos Giants are instinctively drawn to those who bear the favour of the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Norscan Giant units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +4 for Norscan Giant units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The blood of our enemies lies here...
Chosen wont serve this little worm, step aside!
The Chaos Gods look on us and smile, there is only war!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Forsaken by the Gods, now, they fight only out of a dark, unnatural hunger and madness.
